text:
Be it a Christmas party or a birthday shindig, you can always trust the Kardashian/Jenner family to throw the most star-studded and lavish celebrations.

So, after Khloé Kardashian threw the pinkest of baby showers ahead of the arrival of her daughter with Tristan Thompson over the weekend, the 33-year-old decided not to stop there when it came to enjoying the festivities.

That's right, the star threw not one but two parties in less than 12 hours.

Read Next

On Saturday, Khloé and Tristan enjoyed a double celebration: the first was a baby shower at the Bel Air Hotel's Garden Ballroom, before a private dinner hosted by Rémy Martin at the Beauty & Essex restaurant in Hollywood, reports E! News.

Getty Images

Following the shower, the mum-to-be changed out of her sparkly pink dress into a black mini dress, paired with a long coat.

Meanwhile, Tristan wore a black and white tie-dyed jacket, a white T-shirt, black jeans and a large gold and diamond chain.

Getty Images

Getty Images

Getty Images

Guests at the meal included Khloé's sisters Kendall Jenner, Kylie Jenner, Kylie's BFF Jordyn Woods, Kourtney Kardashian and boyfriend Younes Bendjima, Kris Jenner and Tristan's teammate and the NBA's biggest star LeBron James.

During the night, the sportsman was gifted a giant birthday cake with pictures of himself covering the icing.

Getty Images

Getty Images

Getty Images

Getty Images

Following the baby shower and birthday bash on Saturday, Khloe posted a picture of her kissing her beau to Instagram, captioned with a heart.

The party comes amid videos published by Kylie Jenner of her BFF Jordan Woods snuggling with her newborn baby, Stormi Webster.

Khloé is expected to give birth at the end of this month/beginning of April.

What a family fun-filled weekend this lot had.

title: Khloé Kardashian And Tristan Thompson Celebrate His Birthday After Baby Shower With The Family

og.title: Khloé Kardashian Threw A Baby Shower And Tristan Thompson's Birthday Party In Just One Day
og.description: That's a lot of effort while heavily pregnant
